words.source: H1696; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'And the LORD spake/said/spoke' (all render the prefixed form as introductory verb)
H3068; KJV: 'the LORD', ESV: 'the Lord', NASB: 'the LORD' (all substitute divine name with 'LORD/Lord')
H413; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'unto/to' (consistent as preposition indicating direction/speech recipient)
H559; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'saying' (standard infinitive construct for quotative formula)
